website_summaries.verdict: The same high-quality design as other Blendtec models, but with push button controls and a more affordable price.
pros: Simple controls make this blender very easy to use
Boasts a 3 HP motor and a blue lit display
Blends ingredients well, handles ice just fine, and is extremely easy to clean
Users love the 5-sided Wild Side jar, which evenly distributes ingredients, even if they're added last
Simple but powerful machine for making great-tasting smoothies
cons: Noisy and moves around a bit when in use

customer_reviews.title: Kickass Base with a mediocre Mixer Jar
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit mixed on the Blendtec blender package. The blender base/motor is awesome and I zero complaints with 220+ cycles used so far. The mixer jar...This I am not a fan of. The failure really looks like it's going to be the blade bearing. I've ALREADY had it squealing and making a nasty smell a few times. I do not do anything extreme for mixing with my blender either. Just ice and liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: WOW! My new favorite!  Addicted to smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Simply Amazing! Love it and would say I'm officially addicted to healthy smoothies in just four weeks! WOW! It creates smoothies that are dreamy, smooth and yummy! Clean up and pouring are a breeze. Just GO FOR IT, it's worth every penny for a true professional blender.
customer_reviews.author: FL beach fam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Chews up frozen fruit like.... like something that easily chews up frozen fruit. Cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Benton O. Addison

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Blendtec 475 for over a week now. It performs beyond my expectations. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Croteau

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. At first I wasn't sure but after reading the instructions and following directions is blends just about everything into a yummy smoothy.
customer_reviews.author: healthy choices

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender - no issues blending frozen fruit, ice, nuts, etc. when loaded as directed. Occasionally smells "hot" but doesn't seem to affect the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic blender. Powers through everything I've put through it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic blender. Powers through everything I've put through it, smooth and consistent smoothies and purees. A little loud but that's to be expected, it's a blender. Blunted blades work like a charm. Don't expect to chop veggies with it thouh. Only complaint is that I wish the body were steel and the pitcher glass for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great blender so far
customer_reviews.text: great blender so far... it makes the smoothest nut milks and its so so so easy to clean... just a cup of water, a drop of soap and pulse for 10 seconds.. i love everything about this blender so far... hopefully it lasts a while and not break within the first year of purchase like my other cheapo blenders
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. I've had it for over a week now and it's working beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bazzano

customer_reviews.title: Blender is awesome. Enough
customer_reviews.text: When life gives you lemons, just say screw the lemons and bail.... Blender is awesome. Enough said
customer_reviews.author: El Si

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't wait to get it!  Use it daily!
customer_reviews.text: It's all good! This is a replacement from the original that I left with my roommate. Couldn't wait to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanie McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this blender for smoothies! So glad I bought this blender and not another one. Will purchase the higher level blender next time!
customer_reviews.author: Oly Scorp

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great blender - purchased it for making smoothies and haven't had any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schloss

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender! Really blends my fruit and carrots into juice without shreds of pieces left. This definitely works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful blender and use it every day. Sent one to my son in grad school too!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operation, convenient to clean. Perfect for juice and smoothie. I think it is an excellent and powerful blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best blending for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: most affordable,best blending for smoothies...I`m happy and drinking a super smoothie right now...
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: She said it's cool, she can make all kind cold drink at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is gift for my friend. She said it's cool,she can make all kind cold drink at home.
customer_reviews.author: Xu Wei Qiao

customer_reviews.title: This Blender is awesome! I got it pretty cheap through amazon because ...
customer_reviews.text: This Blender is awesome! I got it pretty cheap through amazon because i signed up for an amazon credit card at the same time. Under $200! It works wonderfully and destroys anything i put into it. One thing to keep in mind is that although it can heat up the contents, to make soup or such, but there isn't an actual button for it. so if you want to make soup you'll have to push the button and let it run for its cycle (50 seconds) a couple of times before its heated up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Pricey? Not for the value..
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great - smoothies, soups, nuts. Well worth the money, especially if you consider how many cheap blenders I have burned through over the years. My only complaint is no tamper, but it's rarely needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cellinger

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good deal! Ours even came with the wildside jar. It is definitely the most powerful blender I've ever used. The smoothies come out great. Usually I could get small chunks and seeds in the straw but this thing it's completely smooth. Plus with the 8 year warranty you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: victoriana

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance on refurbed Blendtech and it paid off!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Blendtech! Took a chance on a refurbed item and blender was delivered in perfect condition. I have been using it almost everyday making soups, sauces, bread crumbs and frozen drinks. Even refurbed Blendtech's come with a seven year warranty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MinzInGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: better than expected. fantastic blender , my son says its as powerful as the one he uses ate his blend shop.
customer_reviews.author: bob jensen

customer_reviews.title: Will it blend
customer_reviews.text: its a Blendtec it will blend anything best blender ever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it keeps track of how many times I've used it. Every blend has been perfect and cleaning is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie on kodiak
customer_reviews.text: Best every I have bought all my grown children one for shakes smoothie crush ice fast easy clean
customer_reviews.author: P J S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, frothy smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This blender performs beautifully. We got it yesterday and used it today to make smoothies with frozen fruit and ice with almond milk. Smoothie texture was smooth and frothy. Just using the Smoothie setting I was able to get a smoothie that was easy to suck up through a standard straw. The ice was obliterated; there were no ice chunks to clog up my straw. The ice just made the smoothie colder, not icy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I bought this, so superior to my previous blenders, which were admittedly, much cheaper but had to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this little number is getting pummeled every morning and doesn't flinch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blender. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. Works as advertised. Creates wonderful smoothies from fresh and frozen fruit.
customer_reviews.author: SBezzant

customer_reviews.title: you could blend oak trees in this thing.
customer_reviews.text: it sounds like a p47 is running in your kitchen but it chops the crap out of things.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Considering how much one smoothie costs, this thing will pay for itself in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Holven

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting one of these since 2007 when I first discovered them on YouTube, searching for "iPhone" videos, and found one of them blending an iPhone. This thing is amazing, high quality, and I am sure will last many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it sure gets very
customer_reviews.text: Love it but it sure gets very, very loud ... way too loud ...when in full smoothie mode so I use the other strengths instead.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: I am thinking that the Vitamix Personal is probably a better route to go
customer_reviews.text: You want my honest opinion on this blender? It's AWFUL! You might as well put it in the same category as the NINJA and those other junky blenders .... I use a Vitamix at home .... and THIS THING does NOT even come CLOSE! NOT even close! I am thinking that the Vitamix Personal is probably a better route to go .... PLUS ... this hunk'a'junk doesn't come with a tamper!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Defective after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Had this for two weeks, tried making smoothie with frozen fruit and the smoothie speed stopped working. Will now have to find a box and return it for exchange.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lecompte

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. I have watched them being ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I have watched them being demonstrated in Costco and thought I was buying the same thing. Not so!
customer_reviews.author: Fancydahl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: product motor burned up after 5 uses. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blender that does the job well
customer_reviews.text: My Blendtec is awesome! I use it mainly for smoothies. I’ve had other cheap blenders that would not chop ice and ended up with a dead motor after a short time. I decided to splurge on the Blendtec as a housewarming gift to myself. I read the reviews which were mostly positive and it was $200 less than the Vitamix. It’s a little loud in the morning but that is a minor complaint. It does what it’s supposed to do and I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

product_meta.title: Blendtec Classic 475 120V Blender
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBlendtec Classic 475 includes motorbase and jar. Uses 1475 watts with 3.0 peak horsepower. Has an 8 year warranty. Patented jar design flows ingredients toward the blade, eliminating the need for a tamper. The uniquely blunt safety blade is completely safe to use and clean, plus up to 80% thicker and 10 times stronger than competitors' blades. The smart touchscreen interface enables walk-away blending and does not harbor mold and bacteria like old-fashioned knob-and-dial blenders. The hardened metal drive socket never needs to be replaced. The motor is quiet even at ulta high speed.
feature_bullets: Blendtec Classic 475 includes motorbase and jar
Plunger-free, easy-clean jar and uniquely blunt safety blade
Quiet, ultra high-speed motor and hardened metal drive socket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars85 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
